hk.edu.ouhk.lib.ser

Class ASRReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.edu.ouhk.lib.ser.ASRReport

  • public class ASRReport
extends java.lang.Object
    OUHK In-house Library Tool - Fetch the report from Aleph's Oracle for SER's ASR
    Since:
    Mar 19, 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wai-yan NG, wwyng@ouhk.edu.hk

    • Constructor Detail

      • ASRReport

        public ASRReport(java.lang.String reportPath,
                 java.io.Writer wr)
        Constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        reportPath - The place the Excel report is saved, must have appropriate permission to write into the folder.
        wr - The PrintWriter object for writing out the HTML.

      • ASRReport

        public ASRReport(java.lang.String SVStartDate,
                 java.lang.String SVEndDate,
                 java.lang.String LCStartDate,
                 java.lang.String LCEndDate,
                 java.lang.String reportPath,
                 java.io.Writer wr)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        SVStartDate - The start date of the order status "SV" or "SRV".
        SVEndDate - The end date of the order status "SV" or "SRV".
        LCStartDate - The start date of the order status "LC".
        LCEndDate - The end date of the order status "LC".
        reportPath - The place the Excel report is saved, must have appropriate permission to write into the folder.
        wr - The PrintWriter object for writing out the HTML.

    • Method Detail

      • getReportFile

        public java.lang.String getReportFile()
        Getting the report file name which is ready only after the method 'fetchReport()' is called.
        Returns:
        The generated file name.

      • getReportPath

        public java.lang.String getReportPath()
        Getting the report file path which is set in the constructor
        Returns:
        The report file path.

      • fetchReport

        public void fetchReport()
        Fetching the report in Excel and HTML format. The Excel report is saved in 'reprotPath' which is set by creating the class instance; while HTML report is written out by the Writer 'wr' object if it is set by the constructor. The report file name, which is generated with the time stamp invoking report generation, can be get by the method 'getReportFile()'.
